Summary
Data Scientist with 6+ years of experience building data science products , translating business ambiguity into
statistical solutions. Expertise in product experimentation, metrics definition , and large-scale modeling using
Python, SQL, and AWS . Proven record of owning analysis pipelines from ideation to deployment, bridging product
and technical teams.
Education
•Wichita State University Wichita, KS
Masters in Computer Science; GPA: 3.97 Aug 2019 - May 2021
Courses: Operating Systems, Analysis Of Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Probability and Statistics and Computer Vision.

Languages: Python, SQL, Java, R |ML/Statistical Models: Logistic Regression, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, SHAP,
Hypothesis Testing |Product Analytics: Metric Definition, A/B Testing, Experiment Design, KPI Tracking |Data Engineering:
ETL Pipelines, Data Modeling, Snowflake, AWS Glue, SageMaker |Tools: scikit-learn, pandas, NumPy, PySpark, matplotlib |

Experience

Data Scientist May 2022 – Present
◦Owned end-to-end design of an ML-based patent quality scoring system , reducing downstream review time by

◦Partnered with product managers to define model evaluation metrics , enabling 3 new ML features to launch

Data Engineer Oct 2021 - April 2022

◦Developed a information retrieval system for a retail client using sentence transformers for data embedding and
